meanings.sent1: The handwrought jewelry had intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: She admired the handwrought pottery at the craft fair.
meanings.sent3: The handwrought wooden chair looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her handwrought dress was a masterpiece of craftsmanship.
meanings.sent5: The handwrought iron gate added a touch of elegance to the garden.

meanings.definition: Created or produced by manual labor.
meanings.sent1: The handwrought tools were sturdy and reliable.
meanings.sent2: They appreciated the handwrought furniture in the cabin.
meanings.sent3: The handwrought fence made the neighbors envious.
meanings.sent4: His handwrought sword was a symbol of his skill and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The handwrought clock chimed with a melodious sound.
